title: I Didn't Forget Hub
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
,,[[[xhawk77x|More by this Author]]],,
[[/=]]

Jerry lost his brother Evan when he was only a child. The world wants him to believe that Evan died in a natural disaster, that his death was a meaningless tragedy for which no one could be blamed. Jerry knows better. He knows his brother was taken from him, and he will stop at nothing to uncover the truth. This quest will put him in conflict with some of the greatest powers in the anomalous world and force him to question whether he can trust the people closest to him.

+ Season 1
* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-1-the-galaxy-plaza-disaster|Part 1: The Galaxy Plaza Disaster]]] - Jerry researches the Galaxy Plaza Disaster in which his brother allegedly perished, and finds that he's not the only one whose memories of that night diverge from the official story.

* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-2-spirituality-club|Part 2: Spirituality Club]]] - Jerry investigates the high-school Spirituality Club of which his brother was a prominent member, and considers how its intrigues may have led to the Galaxy Plaza Disaster.

* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-3-richard-michaels|Part 3: Richard Michaels]]] - Jerry further investigates the nature and origins of Spirituality Club, but his snooping seems to be drawing unwanted attention.

* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-4-guiding-star-baptist-church|Part 4: Guiding Star Baptist Church]]] - As the apparent scope of the forces arrayed against him grows, Jerry is forced to question whether his closest ally may, in fact, be one of his enemies.

* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-5-the-star-clad-tome|Part 5: The Star-clad Tome]]] - Jerry's independent investigations seem to be exonerating Theo from Daisy's accusations, but lingering questions continue to gnaw at him.

* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-6-the-service|Part 6: The Service]]] - Jerry's spying gives him a glimpse into one of Theo's church services, and what he finds is stranger and more terrible than he could've possibly imagined.

* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-7-the-church-of-the-blessed-sacrifice|Part 7: The Church of the Blessed Sacrifice]]] - Jerry pays a visit to the Church of the Blessed Sacrifice, resolved to learn once and for all what Theo is hiding from him.

* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-8-Theodore-North|Part 8: Theodore North]]] - The truth comes out as Jerry confronts Theo about the secrets he's been keeping.

* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-9-the-wanderer-s-library|Part 9: The Wanderer's Library]]] - In the aftermath of Theo's betrayal, Jerry is finally able to take his first plunge into the anomalous world.

* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-10-the-serpent-s-hand|Part 10: The Serpent's Hand]]] - Jerry is going to need help if he's to have any chance of rescuing his brother. That help comes with a price, but Jerry is eager enough to pay it if it means he might see his brother again.

* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-11-the-jailors|Part 11: The Jailors]]] - Jerry and his newfound comrades infiltrate a Foundation facility hoping to find information that will lead them to Evan, but the operation doesn't go as planned.

* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-12-site-17|Part 12: Site 17]]] - The moment has come. Jerry and his remaining comrades are heading into Site-17 to find Evan, but what they find there is different than anything they could have possibly expected.

* [[[i-didn-t-forget-pt-13-evan-sanders|Part 13: Evan Sanders]]] - At last, the brothers are reunited, but the occasion is far less joyful than either of them would have liked.

[[=]]

[[/=]]
author: XHAWK77X
